CHRISTO CLAASSENS, SENIOR EXPERIENCE DESIGNER

With 15+ years of creating online experiences, Christo still likes to learn nerdy things about design. He revels in championing user needs, can’t get enough of usability testing, and mashes this together to create simple experiences. Christo is a new dad and can't wait to teach his son Andries the finer nuances of South African culture: speaking Afrikaans, drinking beer, eating biltong and playing rugby.
